mapper.insert: insert into boards(num, writer, email, subject, passwd, reg_date, readcount, ref, re_step, re_level, content, image) values(boards_seq.nextval,#{writer},#{email},#{subject},#{passwd},#{reg_date},#{readcount},boards_seq.currval,0,0,#{content},#{image})
mapper.update: update boards set readcount = readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select passwd from boards where num=#{num}
mapper.update: update boards set writer=#{writer}, email=#{email}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
update boards set re_step = re_step+1 where ref=#{ref} and re_step>#{re_step}
